data.title: Good Healthy Place to Eat
data.text: This place reminds me of Subway, but better. They don't offer a bread option, you choose a regular pita or a whole wheat pita. They offer Hummus or Avocado also. Then its up to you to pick what you want on it... Its a very cool idea... Hope they stay in business, love the food. They also have one of those cool coke machines that lets you pick the syrup flavor as well as the soda flavor. My son digs it :-)

data.title: Downtown, very good, very friendly
data.text: One of the smaller Pita Pit eateries I have eaten in, it is well maintained, cute, and friendly. The style fits in nicely with historic downtown Rapid City. We were fortunate enough to beat the much rush, and found out just how popular this place really is! Obviously, the food is fresh and handmade. Recommend. I love the Gyro with Lamb!

data.title: Great food quick swrvice
data.text: Friendly staff. Great selection. Healthy food. We loved it. This in the historic downtown area which is a great place to see some of the sights in town. Don't miss visiting this area. This was a great place for lunch.

data.title: Amazing!
data.text: Been here a few times but my visit today was above and beyond. The gentlemen there were kind and knowledgeable and provided excellent customer service! Thanks much to the amazing food and service!

data.title: A. Very good lunch at very reasonable prices.
data.text: Pleasant, friendly people wanting to make your visit enjoyable.  You will need to spend some time searching out your choices, but it will be worth it.

data.title: Young at heart
data.text: This is a healthy style pita sandwich shop. This place drew the younger crowd, We got the chicken souvlaki and gyro, then we chose the other ingredients of our sandwich like spinach, tomato, feta cheese. We had the humus and zizit on the side. The combo included chips and drink.  We tried a new style coke machine which was intimidating at first, because of all the options. But it was fun to choose a fountain drink of my own making. We noticed they offered vegetarian pita.

data.title: Pita Pit
data.text: This place has a variety of items to fill your pita. I don't know how they fit it all in. Food is wonderful. I had enough to have lunch next day. My only improvement would be to list the menu better.

data.title: Fresh, healthy sandwiches with a huge variety of ingredients
data.text: My husband and I walked around downtown Rapid City, and after careful thought, we chose this restaurant among many other good choices. It was exactly what I wanted. I ordered a falafel, and was given this large sandwich with all of my favorite vegetables and nicely prepared falafel balls, with tzatziki sauce.  The pricing was very reasonable. All of the ingredients were very fresh and the sandwich was prepared in front of you. If this restaurant were located where I live, I would be here every week.

data.title: The Pita Pit is great for lunch or dinner
data.text: The Pita Pit is a franchise, and as such it is dependable.  Sandwiches are served in a pita pocket bread.  I like the gyro, particularly.  Just good stuff for a casual meal that's not another fast food experience

data.title: Not bad
data.text: Good place for a quick-eat. 2 blocks from the main square. It is a build-your-own pita. They have spinach, avocado, lettuce, tomato, pico de gallo, onions, banana peppers, olives, among other veggies. ordered a gyro. It was about 8 inches long and it filled me up. Staff was helpful. This place was very clean.

data.title: Friendly service and tasty pitas
data.text: Looking to satisfy my vegetarian cravings, I stopped in and got  friendly service.  I loved the ability to build my pita with all sorts of salad toppings.  I had the falafel patty and it was freshly made before my eyes.  Would definitely recommend.

data.title: Quick Lunch
data.text: Pretty average. The pitas are large and filling, but I haven't found a single one that makes me love them. They're good, but not great, and a little on the speedy side.

data.title: Great service
data.text: Tried the gyro, shared with my b.f. & although I wouldn't rate it a 10, Milo was awesome with  customer service. Nice fast casual place to eat.  Other places seemed filled with hipsters & their man buns

data.title: Typical Pita Pit, Good.
data.text: Had lunch with friends.  Food is typical of a Pita Pit, good and served quickly.  Friendly servers.  Will be back again

data.title: The Pita Pit in Rapid City
data.text: Sub shops abound in the US. but who expected an excellent gyro in Rapid City? The menu is diverse. The food quality is excellent. and the value can not be beaten in Rapid City. I was delighted by the souvlaki and the tzatziki. The service was warm, friendly and quite knowledgable. Eating in the open air was a charming experience. We were there for one of the Thursday night, Summer Nights, a sort of block party with bands and lots of fun.They also offer catering.  It is an easy walk from the best hotels in town.

data.title: Grab a bite
data.text: Great place to pick up a quick snack.  It reminded me of Sub-way. It was obvious that we had never been there before and the staff were quick to explain the procedure.

data.title: Fast food done right
data.text: Good food for a good price.  The amount of toppings for the pita was amazing.  All of our group had great choices and were happy with the food.

data.title: Value priced pita
data.text:
The good is that the price of the sandwich is low price, the choice of toppings are fresh and if you choose most of the side toppings, the size of the pita is filling.

The poor is that the size portion of the entree is small without all the side choices, the entree and sides are not well distributed so each bite of the pita is not a cross section of the fillings, and finally the music is to loud such as to make conversation at the table difficult.

data.title: Something different than a sub
data.text: Freshly made just for you pita sandwiches is a nice change from the subs we all seem to fall back on when trying to avoid fast food.  The only negative of this place is parking, which is extremely limited.

data.title: Fresh and healthy fast food!
data.text: This is one of my favorite places to eat in Rapid City! I love that we get to select our own ingredients and each pita is prepared quickly by friendly staff. Because they are so generous with the food items, I can have two meals out of one pita. Don't be discouraged if there is a line, the staff is efficient and it will be worth the short wait for this delicious, fresh, healthy fast food!
